metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16349 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Bento4 1.5.1-628 has a NULL pointer dereference in AP4_ByteStream::ReadUI32 in Core/Ap4ByteStream.cpp when called from the AP4_TrunAtom class.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
